page.title: 18At school
page.content: People start at Mc Knight Annexe when they are about nine and leave when they are 11.Most pupils are nice but some are a bit nasty at times.Mr Benjamin and Mrs. Buckley are P.E. teachers.Mrs stewart plays the piano and Mrs Bowket takes drama and arranges summer and Christmas plays. Mc Knight Annexe hold 143 children. We do mathamatics,geography,history, science,physical education,english and music.We got to the final in football, cricket and netball.We get to school at quarter to nine and the bell goes at 9 o clock.When we get in the classroom we write down spellings. Somedays we have assemblies and they last for twenty minutes .Our classes favourite things are P.E., maths, English and art.
